name: 電子學（一）
description: 使學生了解最基本的電子元件和電路。內容包括信號源的種類、運算放大器(OPA)、二極體(diode)、金氧半場效電晶體(MOSFET)、雙極性電晶體(BJT)、以及放大器等主題。
goals: 增進電子學基本概念的理解
教育學生運用電子學知識與技術，以解決電子相關之工程問題
培養學生獨立思考電子相關工程問題之能力
培養學生對電子學的興趣，進一步奠定學生終身學習之基礎
syllabus:
【16+2 weeks】

16 weeks for the oridinary teaching and 2 weeks for flexible learning

Weeks 1: Introduction

Weeks 2-3:       

Ch.1 Electronics and Semiconductors

\[flexible learning 1\]

Weeks 4-5:

    Ch.2 Operational Amplifiers

Weeks 6-7:

    Ch.3 Diodes

Week 8: Midterm Exam

Weeks 9-10:

    Ch.5 MOS Field-Effect Transistors(MOSFETs)

\[flexible learning 2\]

Weeks 11-12:

    Ch.6 Transistor Amplifiers

      6.1 Basic Principles (MOSFET)

      6.2.1 Small-Signal Operation and Models

      6.3 Basic Configurations (MOSFET)

       The Common-Source (CS), Common-Gate (CG),

and Common-Drain (CD) Amplifiers

Weeks 13:

Ch.4 Bipolar Junction Transistors (BJTs)

Weeks 14-15:

Ch.6 Transistor Amplifiers (BJT)

      6.1 Basic Principles (BJT)

      6.2.2 Small-Signal Operation and Models

      6.3 Basic Configurations (BJT)

       The Common-Emitter (CE), Common-Base (CB),

and Common-Collector (CC) Amplifiers

 Week 16: Final Exam
